definition: to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through

sentences.english: What's with the fancy hairdryer, and stuff?
sentences.chinese: 那高級的吹風機和那些東西幹什麼用？

sentences.english: Hair drier and electric iron is popular in our life.
sentences.chinese: 吹風機與電熨斗已經成爲普及的居家電器。

sentences.english: The hairdresser is drying his hair with the hairdryer.
sentences.chinese: 理髮師在用吹風機給自己吹乾頭髮。

sentences.english: Dry hands with an air dryer, disposable paper towel or personal towel.
sentences.chinese: 用吹風機，一次性紙巾或者個人毛巾把手吹乾。

sentences.english: A magazine rack can be the solution to all your tangled hot tool problems.
sentences.chinese: 雜誌架可以解決吹風機電線老纏在一起的問題。

sentences.english: Hairdryers and irons are available on request from reception.
sentences.chinese: 接待處可以應您的要求提供吹風機和熨斗。

sentences.english: Each room is rustically furnished and features a flat-screen satellite TV.
sentences.chinese: 每間客房均設有一間帶淋浴和吹風機的浴室。

sentences.english: I dry my hair with an electric hair drier after washing hair.
sentences.chinese: 我洗完頭用吹風機吹乾頭髮。

sentences.english: Start blowing air into the bag with the hair dryer.
sentences.chinese: 我洗完頭用吹風機吹乾頭髮。

sentences.english: Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.
sentences.chinese: 客房還提供吹風機和浴室用品。

sentences.english: The nurse turns on the heater and burns her cats fur.
sentences.chinese: 護士打開吹風機來吹貓的毛。

sentences.english: I will never blow my hair inside my room.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不會再我的房間裏面使用吹風機了。

sentences.english: Air Conditioning, Ensuite Bathroom, Hair Dryer, Satellite TV, Telephone.
sentences.chinese: 吹風機，房間內帶盥洗室，電話，空調機。

sentences.english: If you over-use hair dryer, it will damage your hair.
sentences.chinese: 如果你過度使用吹風機，它將對你的頭髮有傷害。

sentences.english: Without an adapter, I can't use my shaver or dryer.
sentences.chinese: 沒有轉接器我就不能用我的刮鬍刀或吹風機了。

sentences.english: Can you quickly use the hairdryer to dry my hair?
sentences.chinese: 你可以快速的用吹風機吹乾我的頭髮嗎？

definition: machine parts or tools kept in reserve/spare parts
